actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the District of Columbia.

official_title: To permit the Capital Yacht Club of the District of Columbia to borrow money without regard to the usury laws of the District of Columbia.

summary.text: Permits the Capital Yacht Club of the District of Columbia to borrow money without regard to the usury laws of the District of Columbia.

titles.title: To permit the Capital Yacht Club of the District of Columbia to borrow money without regard to the usury laws of the District of Columbia.
